channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Email
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Email

item.title: CVE-2024-20867|2024-05-07T04:28:55.132Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Email
item.description: Improper privilege management vulnerability in Samsung Email prior to version 6.1.91.14 allows local attackers to access sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-20807|2024-04-02T00:36:54.564Z -- Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Email
item.description: Implicit intent hijacking vulnerability in Samsung Email prior to version 6.1.90.16 allows local attacker to get sensitive information.
